title: ‘Wizard of Oz’ Coat Belonged to L. Frank Baum?
subtitle: Was a coat belonging to 'Oz' author L. Frank Baum coincidentally used in the MGM film version of 'The Wizard of Oz'?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A second-hand coat selected as part of the costume for Professor Marvel in the 1939 film version of The Wizard of Oz was discovered to have been owned by Oz author L. Frank Baum.
